56628.<voice 00420_00056628><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00420_00056628><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>得……得救了！谢谢你，<pc>。

56629.<voice 00490_00056629><start_lip_sync n0:

56630.<voice 00530_00056630><start_lip_sync n0:

56631.<voice 00600_00056631><start_lip_sync n0:

56633.<voice 00706_00056633><start_lip_sync n0:

56634.<voice 00751_00056634><start_lip_sync n0:

56635.<voice 00781_00056635><start_lip_sync n0:
